channel.title: Unique Divine’s Blog
channel.description: Unique Divine. Programmer and creator obsessed with learning. Co-founder and CEO building Nibiru.

item.title: Brain Optimization, Focus, Nootropics, Testosterone, and Feeding the Mind
item.description: Engineering the biology of focus and skill acquisition. This guide connects nootropic stacks for memory with endocrinology for high-output work and muscle growth. Memory consolidation, structural fats for brain integrity, and the neurochemistry of deep, focused work.

item.title: In the Media
item.description: A selection of podcasts, press coverage, and interviews featuring Unique Divine.

item.title: Advice On How To Take Advice (Including Mine)
item.description: The best advice doesn't demand blind obedience. It's tool to help you adapt, innovate, and find your own way forward.

item.title: Reflection and Logging Outshines Planning
item.description: What if the key to achieving your goals wasn’t planning ahead, but looking back? This was the lesson I learned through years of tracking progress in fitness and productivity.

item.title: Structured Freedom: Using a Flexible Schedule to Unlock More Productivity
Nibi Inc. & Nibiru
item.description: A primer on Nibiru and Nibi Inc.

item.title: GitHub and Git: A Field Guide for Practitioners
Pyenv and Poetry: Setting Up a Professional Python Development Environment
How to Find Your Discord token in the Browser
"If I understood you, would I have this look on my face?" by Alan Alda
"Keep Going" by Austin Kleon
item.description: Keep Going is a book about how to stay in love with your craft. The focus is on creative work, however many of the ideas in the book are applicable to a variety of domains.

item.title: Python: Dataclasses, Abstract Base Classes (ABC), and Object-Oriented Programming (OOP)
Rats, Genes, and Disease Prediction with Generative AI
item.description: I came across a fascinating insight in the field of genomics. Old school linear methods like polygenic risk scores (PRSs) can surprisingly outperform modern neural networks in predicting complex genetic disorders.

item.title: Why I Learned Japanese (And What It Taught Me About Myself)
item.description: A short post on the real reason I learned Japanese (It's not anime).
